group.name: CommonMetadata
group.scalar: IDPicker XML report providing protein database search analysis
To present confident protein identifications from raw peptide identifications

IDPicker infers score thresholds to achieve target false discovery rates (FDR) among peptide identifications. The software can remove artifactual proteins for more parsimonious protein reporting. IDPicker's HTML protein reports cluster indiscernible proteins and those that share peptides, making it far easier to learn the biological lessons presented by each sample. It applies a user-specified experimental hierarchy to collections of peptide identifications and enables users to track the number of spectra or peptides observed for a given protein across multiple experiments.
